question: Which union minister has launched  a new tax payer service module ‘Aaykar Setu’?
explanation: Arun Jaitley, the Union Finance Minister, has launched  a new tax payer service module ‘Aaykar Setu’ in New Delhi on July 10, 2017 that compiles various tax tools, live chat facility, dynamic updates and important links to various processes within the Income Tax Department in a single module. This e-initiative would not only provide better taxpayer services but would also help in reducing the direct physical interface between assesses and tax assessing authorities.
